mapper.insert: insert into group_info (groupName, groupLeader, groupExplain) values (#{groupName}, #{groupLeader}, #{groupExplain})
insert into group_member (groupNo, userId, userName, userGender, userCallNumber) values (#{groupNo}, #{userId}, #{userName}, #{userGender}, #{userCallNumber})
mapper.select: select groupNo, groupName, groupLeader, groupCreateDate from group_info where groupLeader = #{userId} or groupNo in (select groupNo from group_member where userId = #{userId}) order by groupCreateDate

select a.groupNo, ifnull(cnt, 0) as groupMemberCount from (select groupNo from group_info where groupLeader = #{userId} union select groupNo from group_member where userId = #{userId}) as a left join (select groupNo, count(*) as cnt from group_member where groupNo in (select groupNo from group_info where groupLeader = #{userId} union select groupNo from group_member where userId = #{userId}) group by groupNo) as b on a.groupNo = b.groupNo
